package.name: N95
package.shortDescription: Mask for customizing album covers in various music services

descriptionlist.description:
The following music services are supported: Apple Music Spotify Pandora Tidal YouTube Music Marvis Deezer Anghami Third
party tweaks supported: Flow Next Up 2
The following themes are featured (more in future updates): “Apple Watch” by MTAC “BlakiPod” by Boots “Diagonal” by Ethan Whited “Faded” by Ethan Whited “MacBook” by Ethan Whited “Nametag” by Ethan Whited “PushPin” by Ethan Whited “Ripped” by Ethan Whited “Splat” by Ethan Whited “WhiteiPod” by Ethan Whited “iMac” by Ethan Whited “iPhone ”By Ethan Whited “iPhoneAirpods” by Ethan Whited "VintageTV" by ⢈『ƘîИᎶ 』⢈ "ColorfulSquare" by ⢈『ƘîИᎶ 』⢈ "BrokenGlass" by ⢈『ƘîИᎶ 』⢈
